description:
Remove LayoutTests/http/tests/xmlhttprequest/set-dangerous-headers.html since I fixed the test upstream in http://trac.webkit.org/changeset/47873.

TEST=none, won't commit until I see this passing but expected to fail on bots.
BUG=9916
